recommended_degree: Administrasi BIsnis, Administrasi Bisnis, Administrasi, Manajemen Operasi Bisnis Digital, Pemasaran Digital (Sarjana)
job_description:
Brief Job Description :															
1	Assist the Sales Support team with daily administrative tasks														
2	Handle business trip coordination and entertain activities														
3	Prepare and manage sales documents and reports														
4	Support smooth operation of sales processes														
5	Collaborate with the sales team to meet operational needs
